info.title: AyuTrace Backend API
info.description: A comprehensive API for managing ayurvedic herbs supply chain traceability system

tags.name: Raw Material Batches
tags.description: Raw material batch management for herbs collection and tracking

tags.name: Supply Chain
tags.description: Supply chain event tracking throughout the herb processing pipeline

tags.name: Finished Goods
tags.description: Finished product management with composition tracking

tags.name: Documents
tags.description: Document and file management for certificates, photos, and reports

tags.name: QR Codes
tags.description: QR code generation and scanning for product traceability

tags.name: Species
tags.description: Herb species management with conservation and regulatory information

tags.name: Collection Events
tags.description: Herb collection event tracking with quality metrics

tags.name: Utilities
tags.description: Utility endpoints for testing and development - enum values and sample data

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token obtained from login endpoint

OrgType.description: Organization type for different stakeholders in the supply chain

RawMaterialBatchStatus.description: Status of raw material batch in the processing pipeline

DocumentEntityType.description: Type of entity the document is associated with

QREntityType.description: Type of entity that the QR code represents

blockchainIdentity.description: Optional blockchain identity for the user

organizationId.description: Organization ID the user belongs to

handlerId.description: ID of the person handling the event

productId.description: Unique identifier for the finished good

uploadedBy.description: ID of the user who uploaded the document

isPublic.description: Whether the document is publicly accessible

qrCodeId.description: Unique identifier for the QR code

qrHash.description: Unique hash for the QR code

generatedBy.description: ID of the user who generated the QR code

customData.description: Additional custom data for the QR code

scanCount.description: Number of times the QR code has been scanned

isActive.description: Whether the QR code is active

description.example: A medicinal herb known for its adaptogenic properties

nativeRegions.description: Native regions where the herb grows

partsUsed.description: Parts of the plant used medicinally

eventId.description: Unique identifier for the collection event

message.description: Validation error message for the field

post.description: Creates a new user account in the system with organization type-based access control

400.description: Validation error or user already exists

post.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns a JWT token for accessing protected endpoints

get.description: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Record a new herb collection event with quality metrics and location data

quantityKg.description: Quantity of herbs collected in kilograms

initialQualityMetrics.description: JSON string containing quality assessment data

message.example: Quantity must be a positive number

get.summary: Get all collection events for the logged-in farmer
get.description: Returns all collection events created by the authenticated farmer (farmerId from JWT)

post.summary: Create a new raw material batch
post.description: Creates a new raw material batch for tracking herbs through the supply chain

collectionEventIds.description: Array of collection event IDs associated with this batch

get.description: Retrieve a list of raw material batches with pagination and filtering

get.summary: Get a raw material batch by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific raw material batch

put.description: Update an existing raw material batch's information

delete.description: Delete a raw material batch from the system

post.summary: Create a new supply chain event
post.description: Records a new event in the supply chain tracking system

handlerId.description: ID of the user handling the event

notes.example: Quality check passed, transferred to processing facility

get.description: Retrieve supply chain events with pagination and filtering

get.summary: Get supply chain events for a specific batch
get.description: Retrieve all supply chain events associated with a batch

parameters.name: batchId
parameters.description: Batch ID to get events for

200.description: Supply chain events for the batch

get.summary: Get a supply chain event by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific supply chain event

put.description: Update an existing supply chain event

delete.description: Delete a supply chain event from the system

post.description: Creates a new finished product with its composition

percentage.description: Percentage of this raw material in the finished good

get.description: Retrieve finished goods with pagination and filtering

get.summary: Get a finished good by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific finished good

put.description: Update an existing finished good's information

percentage.description: Percentage of this raw material in the finished good

delete.description: Delete a finished good from the system

get.description: Retrieve detailed composition and traceability of a finished good

post.summary: Upload a new document and link to an entity
post.description: Upload a document file and associate it with a specific entity (batch, event, etc.)

entityType.description: Type of entity to link the document to (required)

entityId.description: UUID of the entity to link the document to (required)

400.description: Validation error or file upload error

get.description: Retrieve documents with pagination and filtering
Retrieve detailed information about a specific document

put.description: Update metadata of an existing document

delete.description: Delete a document and its file from the system

post.description: Generate a QR code for traceability of batches or finished goods

entityId.description: ID of the entity to generate QR code for

customData.description: Additional custom data for the QR code

qrHash.description: Unique hash for the QR code

qrImage.description: QR code image as a Data URL

get.description: Retrieve QR codes with pagination and filtering
Scan a QR code and get complete traceability information

200.description: Traceability information for the scanned QR code

get.description: Retrieve the QR code as a PNG image

get.summary: Get a QR code by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific QR code

put.description: Update metadata of an existing QR code

delete.description: Delete a QR code from the system

post.description: Add a new herb species to the database with regulatory information

description.example: A medicinal herb known for its adaptogenic properties and stress-relieving benefits

nativeRegions.description: Native regions where the species grows

partsUsed.description: Parts of the plant used medicinally

get.description: Retrieve herb species with pagination and filtering

get.summary: Get herb species by native region
get.description: Retrieve herb species that are native to a specific region

200.description: Herb species native to the region

404.description: No species found for the region

get.summary: Get a herb species by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific herb species

put.description: Update an existing herb species information

delete.description: Delete a herb species from the system

get.summary: Get all available enum values for testing
get.description: Returns all enum values used in the API for easy testing and validation

enums.description: All available enum values organized by type

get.summary: Get sample test data for all endpoints
get.description: Returns sample data objects for testing all API endpoints with valid enum values

sampleData.description: Sample data for testing each endpoint
